name: FruityCaves
description:
Arrow Keys to Move

TAB to change Tool

CTRL to use Current Tool

P to toggle Pause on/off

Collect the required amount of fruit and get out before timer expires. Progress through the levels. Go back and revisit previous levels to up your global highscore.

Game Objects: Soft and Hard Fruit, Key, Gate, Rock, Bomb, Lolly, Dynamite, Constructor, Magnet, Fence, Round Wall, Steel Wall, Push Wall, Magic Wall, Sticky Wall, Spawner, Quicksand, Dirt, Teleport, Lava, Water, Time Bonus.

Bug Objects: Butterfly1, Butterfly2, Line Bug, Fruit Eater, Dirt Eater, Dirt Maker, Attractor, Repellor, Pusher, Transformer, Exploder, Stunner and 4 types of Slime.

Each new level is a puzzle to solve.
